description: Azure Synapse Dedicated SQL Pools having CPU, Memory and DW Average Utilization less than 5% with the given ElapsedDays is considered idle. Utilization is identified using the Azure monitor metric data. ElapsedDays input parameter can be modified as per user convenience.
